Package org.consensusj.bitcoin.cli

Command-line tool and library for communicating with cryptocurrency daemons using JSON-RPC

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BitcoinCLITool
    An attempt at cloning the bitcoin-cli tool, but using Java and bitcoinj
    CliCommand
    Base class for CLI commands that use Bitcoin RPC
    CliOptions
    Command-line options for tools that communicate with Bitcoin RPC
    GetBlockCount
    A test CLI client that simply gets the blockCount

Package org.consensusj.bitcoin.cli Description

Command-line tool and library for communicating with cryptocurrency daemons using JSON-RPC
